summary: Implemented an English/Turkish dropdown and added a translations module used across Header/Newsletter UI, plus language-based PDF URL switching for Newsletter 1. However, the diff appears to introduce extra language scaffolding, modifies an immutable file, adds a PDF.js CDN dependency, and does not show the Turkish PDF asset being added. Some user-facing strings (e.g., footer) remain untranslated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement Turkish translations for all user-facing text currently hardcoded in the UI so that switching the language to Turkish renders Turkish text throughout the site.
missing_requirements.reason: The footer text remains in English and is not sourced via the translation system, so it will not switch to Turkish.

missing_requirements.requirement: When Turkish is selected, Newsletter 1 must open the attached Turkish PDF asset instead of the English PDF.
missing_requirements.reason: Code references a Turkish PDF path, but the diff does not show the Turkish PDF file being added to the repository/assets, so the required attached asset integration is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths (including frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts/tsx).
missing_requirements.reason: An immutable file is shown as modified in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/kept support/scaffolding for additional languages beyond English and Turkish (e.g., Danish, Bulgarian, Spanish) in translations and language name mappings.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states a non-goal of adding or enabling additional languages beyond English and Turkish, but the diff includes translation entries and language names for multiple extra languages.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced loading PDF.js from a third-party CDN inside the PDF viewer to detect page count.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest non-goals disallow adding third-party translation services/external APIs and also ask not to redesign PDF viewer behavior beyond selecting the correct PDF per language; adding a CDN-loaded dependency and new PDF processing logic is not requested and changes viewer behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed newsletter display behavior to always use placeholder newsletters rather than backend-fetched newsletter data.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on language selection, translations, and language-specific PDFs; always overriding fetched data with placeholders is not requested.
No requirement requests changes to authentication/Internet Identity, and the BuildRequest explicitly lists this path as immutable.
